pma:database.name: tourist_management
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `admin` ( `A_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `EMAIL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `PASSWORD` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `MOBILE` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `ROLE` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `LOGID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`A_ID`), KEY `fk_admin` (`LOGID`), CONSTRAINT `fk_admin` FOREIGN KEY (`LOGID`) REFERENCES `login` (`LOGID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `bookings` ( `ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `Name` text DEFAULT NULL, `Booking_Date` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `Payments` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Manager_ID` int(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`), KEY `Foreign_key` (`Manager_ID`), CONSTRAINT `Foreign_key` FOREIGN KEY (`Manager_ID`) REFERENCES `hotel_manager` (`ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `check_in_list` ( `ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `Name` text DEFAULT NULL, `Check_In_Date` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `Payments` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Manager_ID` int(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`), KEY `F_key2` (`Manager_ID`), CONSTRAINT `F_key2` FOREIGN KEY (`Manager_ID`) REFERENCES `hotel_manager` (`ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `hotel service` ( `HS_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `PRICE` int(50) DEFAULT NULL, `DESTINATION` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `TYPE OF HOTEL` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `RATING` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `AVAILABILITY` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `T_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `HSP_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `A_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `TP_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`HS_ID`), KEY `fk_hotel_service` (`T_ID`), KEY `f` (`HSP_ID`), KEY `fk_hs_admin` (`A_ID`), KEY `fk_hs_plan` (`TP_ID`), CONSTRAINT `fk_hotel_service` FOREIGN KEY (`T_ID`) REFERENCES `tourist` (`T_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_hs_admin` FOREIGN KEY (`A_ID`) REFERENCES `admin` (`A_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_hs_plan` FOREIGN KEY (`TP_ID`) REFERENCES `tour planner` (`TP_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `hotel service provider` ( `HSP_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `EMAIL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `PASSWORD` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `ADDRESS` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `MOBILE` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `RATING` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `LOGID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `T_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `TA_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `A_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`HSP_ID`), KEY `fk_service_provider` (`LOGID`), KEY `fk_t_a` (`TA_ID`), KEY `fk_t` (`T_ID`), KEY `fk_a` (`A_ID`), CONSTRAINT `fk_a` FOREIGN KEY (`A_ID`) REFERENCES `admin` (`A_ID`), CONSTRAINT `fk_service_provider` FOREIGN KEY (`LOGID`) REFERENCES `login` (`LOGID`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_t` FOREIGN KEY (`T_ID`) REFERENCES `tourist` (`T_ID`), CONSTRAINT `fk_t_a` FOREIGN KEY (`TA_ID`) REFERENCES `tourist agent` (`TA_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `hotel_info` ( `Hotel_ID` int(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Name` text DEFAULT NULL, `Address` text DEFAULT NULL, `Email` text DEFAULT NULL, `Description` text DEFAULT NULL, `Image` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `Manager_ID` int(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Hotel_ID`), KEY `F_key` (`Manager_ID`), CONSTRAINT `F_key` FOREIGN KEY (`Manager_ID`) REFERENCES `hotel_manager` (`ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1006 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `hotel_manager` ( `ID` int(20) NOT NULL, `Name` text DEFAULT NULL, `Password` text DEFAULT NULL, `Email` text DEFAULT NULL, `Address` text DEFAULT NULL, `Image` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `login` ( `LOGID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `PASSWORD` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `ROLE` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`LOGID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `reviews` ( `Review_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `Customer_Name` text DEFAULT NULL, `Rating` text DEFAULT NULL, `Review` text NOT NULL, `Image` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Review_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `roomservicerequest` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `RoomNo` int(11) NOT NULL, `MealTime` tinytext DEFAULT NULL, `Appetizer` text DEFAULT NULL, `MainDish` text DEFAULT NULL, `Dessert` text DEFAULT NULL, `seq_val` int(11) DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `RoomNo` (`RoomNo`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `room_no_seq` ( `next_not_cached_value` bigint(21) NOT NULL, `minimum_value` bigint(21) NOT NULL, `maximum_value` bigint(21) NOT NULL, `start_value` bigint(21) NOT NULL COMMENT 'start value when sequences is created or value if RESTART is used', `increment` bigint(21) NOT NULL COMMENT 'increment value', `cache_size` bigint(21) unsigned NOT NULL, `cycle_option` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '0 if no cycles are allowed, 1 if the sequence should begin a new cycle when maximum_value is passed', `cycle_count` bigint(21) NOT NULL COMMENT 'How many cycles have been done' ) ENGINE=InnoDB SEQUENCE=1;

CREATE TABLE `room_service_request` ( `Room_no` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Meal_time` text NOT NULL, `Appetizer` text NOT NULL, `Main_Dish` text NOT NULL, `Dessert` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Room_no`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10001 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
pma:database.pma:trigger: CREATE TRIGGER `Set_Max_Room_no` BEFORE INSERT ON `room_service_request` FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF NEW.Room_no < 101 OR NEW.Room_no > 110 THEN SIGNAL SQLSTATE '45000' SET MESSAGE_TEXT = 'Room_no must be between 101 and 110.'; END IF; END
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `tourist` ( `T_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `EMAIL` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `PASSWORD` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `ADDRESS` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `MOBILE` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `DOB` date DEFAULT NULL, `NID` int(20) DEFAULT NULL, `PASSPORT` int(20) DEFAULT NULL, `GENDER` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL, `ROLE` varchar(8) DEFAULT NULL, `LOGID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `TA_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `HSP_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`T_ID`), KEY `fk_login` (`LOGID`), KEY `fk_hsp` (`HSP_ID`), KEY `fk_ta` (`TA_ID`), CONSTRAINT `fk_hsp` FOREIGN KEY (`HSP_ID`) REFERENCES `hotel service provider` (`HSP_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_login` FOREIGN KEY (`LOGID`) REFERENCES `login` (`LOGID`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_ta` FOREIGN KEY (`TA_ID`) REFERENCES `tourist agent` (`TA_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `tourist agent` ( `TA_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `EMAIL` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `PASSWORD` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `ADDRESS` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `MOBILE` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `RATING` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `ROLE` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `LOGID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `T_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `HSP_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `A_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`TA_ID`), KEY `fk_agent` (`LOGID`), KEY `fk1_t` (`T_ID`), KEY `fk2_hsp` (`HSP_ID`), KEY `fk3_a` (`A_ID`), CONSTRAINT `fk1_t` FOREIGN KEY (`T_ID`) REFERENCES `tourist` (`T_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk2_hsp` FOREIGN KEY (`HSP_ID`) REFERENCES `hotel service provider` (`HSP_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk3_a` FOREIGN KEY (`A_ID`) REFERENCES `admin` (`A_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_agent` FOREIGN KEY (`LOGID`) REFERENCES `login` (`LOGID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `tour planner` ( `TP_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `PRICE` int(50) DEFAULT NULL, `DESTINATION` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `TYPE OF TRANSPORT` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `RATING` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `AVAILABILITY` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `T_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `TA_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `A_ID` varchar(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`TP_ID`), KEY `fk_tour_plan` (`T_ID`), KEY `ta` (`TA_ID`), KEY `admin` (`A_ID`), CONSTRAINT `admin` FOREIGN KEY (`A_ID`) REFERENCES `admin` (`A_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `fk_tour_plan` FOREIGN KEY (`T_ID`) REFERENCES `tourist` (`T_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `ta` FOREIGN KEY (`TA_ID`) REFERENCES `tourist agent` (`TA_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

table.name: reviews
table.column: Great service and great food. really enjoyed my stay in this hotel.

table.name: reviews
table.column: Really disappointed with the services of this 5-star hotel. Their food was barely edible. they even had the audacity to put chick peas in an “Authentic chinese” fried rice.
